<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Code models. Some only make sense for 64-bit code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SunCC  Reloc   CodeModel  Constraints</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// abs32  Static  Small      text+data+bss linked below 2^32 bytes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// abs44  Static  Medium     text+data+bss linked below 2^44 bytes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// abs64  Static  Large      text smaller than 2^31 bytes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pic13  PIC&#95;    Small      GOT &lt; 2^13 bytes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pic32  PIC&#95;    Medium     GOT &lt; 2^32 bytes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// All code models require that the text segment is smaller than 2GB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codemodel/#afc59396a9e5809fc92938e203d91a8df">CodeModel::Model</a></span></CodeLine>
